title: Ferry Tempo Data
description: Data schema for any given route from the Ferry Tempo API

boatData.title: Ferry Tempo Route Boat(s) Data
boatData.description: An object representing all boats for a given route.

portData.title: Ferry Tempo Route Ports Data
portData.description: An object representing the ports for a given route.

lastUpdate.description: Date/time in epoch format of the last Ferry Tempo data update.

singleBoatData.title: Ferry Tempo Single Boat Data
singleBoatData.description: Data schema for any given boat from the Ferry Tempo API

ArrivingTerminalAbbrev.description: The abbreviated terminal name that represents the vessel's next destination. Might not be present if the next scheduled destination is still being determined.

ArrivingTerminalName.description: Unique identifier pertaining to the terminal that represents the vessel's next destination. Might not be present if the next scheduled destination is still being determined.

AtDock.description: Indicates whether or not the vessel is docked.

BoatDepartureDelay.description: Seconds delayed.  Tallies how late a boat is to depart. Resets when boat reaches destination.

BoatETA.description: Date/time in epoch format of the boat's expected arrival at the terminal.  Returns null if the boat is currently docked.

DepartingTerminalName.description: The name of the terminal where this vessel is docked or was last docked.

DepartingTermnialAbbrev.description: The abbreviated terminal name where this vessel is docked or was last docked.

Direction.description: Conveys travel towards one port or the other.  Naming convention allows for product growth where routes are less overtly E-W.

Heading.description: The heading of the vessel (in degrees).

InService.description: Indicates whether or not the vessel is in service.

LeftDock.description: Date/time in epoch format of when the vessel last left the dock. This value is not present when docked.

OnDuty.description: Conveys if a boat is truly in service.

PositionUpdated.description: Date/time in epoch format of when boat position was last updated by WSDOT.

ScheduledDeparture.description: Date/time in epoch format of when boat is next scheduled to depart a port.  Not present if scheduled departure is still being determined.

Speed.description: The speed of the vessel (in Knots).

VesselPositionNum.description: For a given route, the number used to identify the scheduled departures being serviced by this vessel. Not present if vessel is not in service.

singlePortData.title: Ferry Tempo Single Port Data
singlePortData.description: Data schema for any given port from the Ferry Tempo API

BoatAtDock.description: Indicates if an in-service vessel is in port.

NextScheduledSailing.description: Date/time in epoch format of next scheduled departure from the port. Returns null if port has no scheduled sailing.

PortDepartureDelay.description: Average delay in seconds of boats departing port for current sailing day.  Resets at 00:00 each day.

PortETA.description: Date/time in epoch format of arrival of the next boat.
